channel.title: Adrin Amin Salehi
channel.description: Recent content on Adrin Amin Salehi

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I'm Adrin, I'm a Technology enthusiast and software engineer. I deeply care about the role of technology in our society. I always try to find ways to use our craft and tools to improve our environment, and eventually peoples lifes. So that in the end, everybody can benefit from new technologies. I never stop learning and I always try apply my new skills to solve real world problems.
